title: Scollbars enabled but not functional in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars appear to be enabled. However, they are non-functional and do not have any effect. Even when opening a small image like an icon, the scrollbars do not perform any action.
SR:
1. Open Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Launch the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled.
4. Attempt to move the scrollbars.
5. Notice that the scrollbars do not have any effect or perform any action, even when opening a small image like an icon.
